intro: Hello, how can I help you regarding your onboarding process?

messages.prompt: Hi, one question regarding notebook delivery. Why do new colleagues with the name Mike receive their notebooks two weeks late? Happened twice in the last month.

messages.response: I'm glad you ask. Rachel implemented that three years ago. Optimization of your procurement processes.
From the conversation history I see that Mikes, according to your numbers start their onboarding delayed. But maybe there is more to it. Better to reach out to her directly.
